# Aisle Wedding Planner

> A calm, beautiful online wedding planner for engaged couples.

## What is Aisle?

Aisle is a free web-based wedding planning tool that helps couples organize their wedding without stress. It's designed to be simple, elegant, and focused on what matters most - your wedding day.

## Key Features

- **Budget Tracker**: Track estimated vs actual wedding costs
- **Guest List Manager**: Manage RSVPs, meals, and contact info
- **Day-of Timeline**: Hour-by-hour schedule for your wedding day
- **Seating Chart Builder**: Visual drag-and-drop seating arrangements
- **Vendor Contacts**: Keep track of all your wedding vendors
- **Wedding Party Management**: Organize bridesmaids, groomsmen, and roles
- **Planning Checklists**: Never miss a wedding planning milestone
- **RSVP Collection**: Share a link for guests to submit their info
- **PDF Export**: Download your plans anytime

## Pricing

- **Essentials (Free)**: Budget tracker, guest list, day-of schedule
- **Complete ($29 one-time)**: All 10+ templates, lifetime access, no subscriptions

## Who is Aisle for?

- Newly engaged couples
- Couples who want a simple, stress-free planning experience
- DIY brides and grooms
- Budget-conscious couples
- Anyone overwhelmed by complex wedding planning tools

## Why Aisle?

1. No app download required - works in any browser
2. No monthly subscriptions - free forever or one-time payment
3. Beautiful, calm interface designed to reduce wedding stress
4. Built by an engaged couple (Sarah & Gabe) who understand the journey

## URL

https://aisleboard.com
